What’s a pen?
CodePen is an HTML, CSS, and JavaScript code editor in your browser with instant previews.
These are my best CodePens—seven of which were [featured on their homepage](https://codepen.io/collection/hfqlg).
music: If you like hip-hop, check out my chronological playlist, [Hippity Hop and Whatnot Through the Ages](https://open.spotify.com/playlist/75emnP49rQPR8D95pMIa3u), or, if you’re into synthwave, check out my playlist, [OutRetroSynthVapourRunWave](https://open.spotify.com/playlist/3H8w4bXd8Kwz70Z1cFNdc0).
Check out my [Listening page](/listening) to see what I’ve been listening to regularly.
